entry.title: Sample Pack (FREE after included coupon redemption)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Friendly Mailer
Type:
Price: 25.00

Ships same or next business day 


Want to check the quality of our mailers? We've put together this sample pack for you to try out with a one time use coupon included to cover the cost of it, making it free after you redeem the coupon on an order of our Eco Friendly Biodegradable Mailers, Eco Friendly Bubble Mailers, and/or Plant Based Compostable Mailers.

 

 

Includes one of each:

  • 17cm x 30cm Eco Friendly Biodegradable Mailer Bag
  • 25cm x 35cm Eco Friendly Biodegradable Mailer Bag
  • 37cm x 50cm Eco Friendly Biodegradable Mailer Bag
  • 45cm x 64cm Eco Friendly Biodegradable Mailer Bag 
  • 17cm x 30cm Compostable Plant Based Mailer Bag
  • 25cm x 35cm Compostable Plant Based Mailer Bag
  • 37cm x 50cm Compostable Plant Based Mailer Bag
  • 17cm x 30cm Eco Friendly Biodegradable Bubble Mailer
  • 25cm x 35cm Eco Friendly Biodegradable Bubble Mailer
  • 37cm x 50cm Eco Friendly Biodegradable Bubble Mailer
  • 1 Roll of Biodegradable Tape
  • A Discount Card For The Full Cost Of The Sample Pack

*Discount card is single use per customer/location*
